attributes.action: Force the resignation of or sack Alastair Darling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 1st it was the loss of our personal information, then the Northern Rock fiasco leading to nationalisation, and now the worst budget I have seen from this government. Before this budget I was an avid Labour fan but now I think Labour has seen dark days. This budget hits us citizens that like to go out and party after working harder hours than any other European nation and leaves the people that keep their money out of the country unscathed. Enough is enough. Alastair Darling needs to stop running the country's finances and NOW! If need be make him Minister for Small Cupboards in Parliament.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
